front.title: IEEE Standard for Information Technology--System and Software Life Cycle Processes--Reuse Processes

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: A common framework for extending the system and software life cycle processes of IEEE Std 12207â„¢-2008 to include the systematic practice of reuse is provided. The processes, activities, and tasks to be applied during each life cycle process to enable a system and/or product to be constructed from reusable assets are specified. The processes, activities, and tasks to enable the identification, construction, maintenance, and management of assets supplied are also specified.
